headline.main: New Insights on Why Some Children Are Fat Offer Clues on Weight Loss

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: Experts are finally gaining insight into the genetic and chemical roots of childhood obesity and are trying to develop sensible programs for childhood weight loss.
docs.snippet: LEAD: Experts are finally gaining insight into the genetic and chemical roots of childhood obesity and are trying to develop sensible programs for childhood weight loss.

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: BABY BOOMERS brought up on a steady diet of children's cereals in the 1960's and 70's must be struck by the commercials for adult cereals over the last two or three years. Unlike the commercials of their youth, which emphasized fun and tie-ins with television characters, adult cereals trumpet their fiber and dried fruits.
